name: DecadeByDecade
description:
We got some intel.

The last capsule containing the rarest energy source was stuck on Planet #380E in 1982.

Mission was completed successfully.

But...

The energy source has to be handled very carefully.

We got two main instructions:

1. If our rocket collides with the ground or cliff here, the energy source will be destroyed taking down the rocket with it.

2. We cannot travel directly from 1982 to 2012.

We have to travel DecadeByDecade.
